name: ethchain.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: Dappnode package responsible for providing the Ethereum blockchain, based on Parity v2.3.8-stable

environment: EXTRA_OPTS=--jsonrpc-port 8545 --jsonrpc-interface all --jsonrpc-hosts all --jsonrpc-cors all --ws-interface 0.0.0.0 --ws-port 8546 --ws-origins all --ws-hosts all --ws-max-connections 1000 --warp-barrier 7350000

author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)
